Sentencas: Due to high operating temperature (800-1000 degrees C) of SOFC's, limited number of alloys can be employed for the purpose of current collection.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of these alloys usually decreases during the operation of SOFC because of highly corrosive cathode (air side) environment.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Cr evaporation from such alloys is also an important problem of performance degradation.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: A spinel Mn1.5Co1.5O4 and perovskite La0.60Sr0.40FeO3 mixture is coated on Crofer alloy for corrosion and chromium protection in the cathode side of a SOFC.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: In study firstly, the performance of the fuel cell with the Crofer 22 APU as interconnect material was measured up to 100 h without any coating.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Secondly, using a screen printing method, bare Crofer 22 APU was coated with Mn1.5Co1.5O4
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: and finally Mn1.5Co1.5O4 + La0.60Sr0.40FeO3 ceramic powder slurries were employed as the coating material.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Then, the performances of a SOFC short stack with interconnects coated by two methods were compared with uncoated interconnect.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: Results show that uncoated interconnect experienced a significant performance lost from 4.5 W to 3.8 W.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: On the other hand the cells with screen printing coated with a mixture Mn1.5Co1.5O4
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects

Sentencas: and La0.60Sr0.40FeO3 exhibited decreases only from 5.78 W to 5.42 W in the short-term performance tests.
Titulo: Application of a coating mixture for solid oxide fuel cell interconnects
